basics.name: Kiran Varma
basics.label: Software Engineer
basics.summary: I am a Dynamic, self-motivating Senior Software Engineer with over 10 years of experience in designing and developing solutions across various tiers of software stack. I have worked on greenfield and established projects developing server-side and client-side web based applications. I am able to work independently or can fit into any team and immediately contribute my experiences and skills. I am passionate about delivering high quality software and learning new technologies.

work.summary: Worked on implementing Backend For Frontend architectural design pattern for NewLook mobile/web app.
work.skills: Node.js, NestJS, Typescript, JavaScript, Azure, Docker, Kubernetes, Helm, PostgreSQL, Redis, Jest, Restful API, Argo CD, Mulesoft, Wiremock.

work.summary: Worked on implementing balance transfer API and backend logic for a credit card application.
work.skills: Node.js, Express, Typescript, JavaScript, AWS, Lambdas, DynamoDB, Restful API, Serverless, Redis, Jest.
Node.js, JavaScript, React, AWS (DynamoDB, API Gateway, Lambda, Step Functions, SQS, SNS), Serverless.
Node.js, Java 11, TypeScript, Express, OAuth 2.0, Mocha, Chai, SuperTest, HTML, CSS, Docker, Kubernetes, Microsoft Azure, Jenkins, Microservices, PostgreSQL.

work.summary: Worked as a full stack developer to create a regulatory reporting platform which is a web based Spring MVC application that uses AngularJS for frontend development. REST services are used to handle client-server requests. My role was in developing backend services layer to apply business rules, expose data to the reporting layer as Restful Services and show data in frontend reports. Also worked on supporting/defect resolution for the entire application.
work.skills: Java 8, Javascript, TypeScript, Angular, Spring MVC, HTML, CSS, Teradata, Oracle, Tomcat, TeamCity.
